ex_zhh: 你做嘢爽手啲啦，唔好成日揼波钟
ex_chs: 你干活要麻利一些，不要老是浪费时间
ex_en: You need to be more efficient at your work and stop wasting time.
Don't throw it at me.sense of power

ex_chs: 扔在一边，随意不经意扔，带力度

ex_en: She/He threw away my ice cream.

Throw a pair of slippers over

ex_en: He threw a ball right at me; the speed was like a sports car.
Why are you pushin g me?

ex_en: to have an inexplicable drive to do something
setting up a stall to do business

ex_chs: 錯了或沒能力情況下，仍然強硬地堅持不認輸或不承認錯，帶固執、不願罷休
ex_en: Even when lacking the ability they stubbornly refused to admit defeat.
You have a few strange quirks

ex_chs: 这样的话岂不是很吃亏
ex_en: Wouldn't that be a huge loss?

ex_chs: 你能帮我把剩下的米饭吃完吗
ex_en: Could you help me finish up my serving of rice?

ex_chs: 已经有不少人开始离开了。
ex_en: A number of people already start leaving.

ex_en: to be well-dressed; literally: to wear like a bird

ex_en: used to describe a broadly smiling face

ex_chs: 他对我这么好，那么我是要嫁给他？
ex_en: He's so good to me, so should I marry him?

ex_zhh: 佢對我咁好，噉我喺咪要嫁俾佢？
ex_chs: 他对我这么好，那么我是要嫁给他？
ex_en: He's so good to me, so should I marry him?

现在很烦恼，不知道该怎么办
ex_en: I'm really troubled right now and I don't know what to do.

这样啊；一般说完在思考
ex_en: I know,I know; usually, one thinks after speaking.

ex_chs: 人与人之间的关系中，人性的尊严十分罕见；毫不夸张地说，“人性的尊严薄如纸”
ex_en: human decency is rare in relationships between people; literally "human decency is as thin as paper

ex_chs: 一片混乱；彻底的混乱；字面意思：如同七国时代般混乱。
ex_en: ?in a total mess; in total chaos; literally: as chaotic as the Seven Warring States
something too good to be true

ex_chs: 这么久以来；到目前为止；直到现在
那根棍子像黄瓜一样粗。
ex_en: That stick was as thick as a cucumber.
So what do you want me to do?

ex_chs: 那又怎么样？；不礼貌很拽

ex_en: an expression of courtesy used when someone has done something for you, similar to saying "it is very nice of you"; "I don't deserve it"; "you shouldn't have"

ex_zhh: 你睇，邊個明星咁多保镖，洗唔洗咁緊要啊
ex_chs: 你看，是哪个明星需要那么多个保镖啊，需要那么夸张吗
ex_en: Look, which celebrity needs so many bodyguards? Is it really necessary to go to such lengths?
Saving lives is the most important thing
He's pretty good at working out.

ex_chs: 想法不怕落后，最重要有人接受
ex_en: Old tricks are not cliché as long as the other person likes it.

ex_chs: 大概就是这么样，差不多就是这样

ex_zhh: 呢架嘢都有返咁上下重量?
邊有咁大隻蛤乸隨街跳
ex_en: There's no such thing as a free lunch.

ex_zhh: 咁大隻蛤乸隨街跳？冇咁简单噶
ex_chs: 这么容易/这么好/这么优惠？没那么简单的
ex_en: Is it that easy/good/affordable? It's not that simple.
There's no such thing as a free lunch.
I don't believe in free lunches.

ex_chs: 怎么这么巧；感叹怎么这么巧

ex_zhh: 我啱諗住整對波鞋，跟住我睇啱果對打折，真系啱晒
ex_chs: 我正想买一双新运动鞋，然后就看到我想要的那双在打折。太巧了！
ex_en: I was just thinking about getting a new pair of sneakers, and then I saw the exact ones I wanted on sale. What a coincidence!

ex_chs: 怎么这么巧；形容这么有空过来我这里坐坐
ex_en: What a coincidence; describing someone having so much free time to come and sit down here.

ex_zhh: 咁多人跳楼唔見你跳楼
ex_chs: 这么多人死不见你死；跳楼可以换任何死法
ex_en: So many people have died, but you haven't; jumping off a building can lead to any kind of death.

ex_zhh: 有得走后門你仲甘搏命？
ex_chs: 有捷径不走偏要辛苦自己
ex_en: Instead of taking the shortcut, you choose to work hard.

ex_chs: 这么大一个人别他妈的不开通

ex_chs: 这么大一个人了，不要那么封建

ex_chs: 这么大一个人别他妈的不开通
人不够厉害不敢到外地

Excuse me, waiter, could you come and take our order?

那怎么行；不是吧；那怎么好意思呢

ex_en: Mistakenly believing the target was beaten

ex_en: As you like , I can eat whatever.

I'm not familiar with him at all.

ex_en: I'm not familiar with him at all; I don't know him. I don't want anyone to know about my relationship with him.

ex_en: The fortune teller says nothing true but nonsense.

想點閪樣/想點撚樣//想點柒樣/想點鸠樣

ex_en: He won't go to the nest, what's your decision?

ex_en: Wow! What were they thinking, making it like this?

ex_en: Put these trivial matters aside；It means there were originally many

ex_en: If something gets moldy, throw it away.

Get out of here; at the fastest speed
Get out of here; vulgar expression

ex_chs: 走开啊，你不要过来；讨厌，害怕
ex_en: Go away, don't come any closer; I hate it, I'm scared.

ex_en: Let's go, you're not welcome here.

ex_zhh: 揼閪咗手上啲嘢佢/揼撚咗手上啲嘢佢

ex_chs: 一下子摔在地上特别疼
ex_en: It hurts a lot when you fall to the ground.

ex_chs: 扔一样东西来，扔过来速度很快，（對拖鞋）=一双拖鞋
ex_en: Throw a pair of slippers over. It was thrown very fast.

ex_chs: 给人割韭菜了，她后悔莫及
ex_en: She regretted betraying her friends and exploiting them.

ex_zhh: 隻股票今朝升到叭叭聲，早知尋日入定貨啦，真係揼春。
ex_chs: 真后悔，那只股票今天涨了，早知道昨天加仓
ex_en: I really regret it; that stock went up today. I should have bought more yesterday.

ex_zhh: 整鍋杰噶佢嘆下/整鋪杰噶佢嘆下

ex_chs: 给她/他看看你有多能打
ex_en: Show her/him how good you are at fighting
This dish involves quite a few steps.

ex_zhh: 俾多三日時間你，咪再揼功夫窝
ex_chs: 再给你三天时间，别再延迟时间了
ex_en: I'll give you three more days. Don't delay any longer.

ex_zhh: 揼低佢重新出发好過啦

ex_en: Can you let go and forget him/her?

ex_chs: 不提醒一下他/她不聪明
ex_en: He/She isn't smart if I don't remind him/her.

ex_chs: 用低级容易失传的谎言佢哄骗人
ex_en: to deceive somebody using a poor excuse or lies that are easily seen through; lterally: to trick a ghost to eat bean curd

ex_chs: 骗我你就厉害；形容当事人比较单纯经常被骗
ex_en: "You're amazing if you lie to me" describes someone who is naive and easily deceived.

ex_chs: 骗鬼吃最怕的道符；也就是说你说了一个鬼都不会信的谎言
ex_en: You tricked the ghost into eating the most feared talisman; in other words, you told a lie that even a ghost wouldn't believe.

ex_chs: 一个人行动闪闪缩缩，浑水摸鱼
ex_en: One person acts furtively and stealthily, taking advantage of the chaos.

ex_chs: 你看她/他多么傻，感觉很低能
ex_en: Look how silly she/he is, he/she seems so stupid.

ex_zhh: 佢成嚿大番薯噉，解釋極都唔明
ex_chs: 他真的很笨，说真详细都明白
ex_en: He's like an idiot. He couldn't understand why I am saying no matter how many times I explained to him.

ex_chs: 容人龇牙咧嘴地笑的样子
ex_en: The way he grinned with his teeth showing.
Don't be foolish and get scammed.

ex_zhh: 佢戇居居噉望住個蛋糕发吽窦
ex_chs: 她/他傻乎乎地看着蛋糕在发呆
ex_en: She/He stared blankly at the cake, lost in thought.

ex_zhh: 你揾咗條水魚翻離，几時劏咗
ex_chs: 你找了个冤大头回来，什么时候捞一笔
ex_en: You've brought back a sucker; when are you going to make some money off him?

ex_chs: 对亲家；原意两个男生同时和一个女生谈恋爱
ex_en: To in-laws; originally meant two boys dating the same girl at the same time.

ex_chs: 找了个男朋友；有一种找了个大冤种回来的意思
ex_en: I found a boyfriend; It has the connotation of finding a great traitor.

ex_chs: 每晚要陪干爹；一般指年轻女生服侍年纪大的男生目的只想在他身上捞一笔
ex_en: I have to spend every night with my godfather.；This generally refers to a young woman serving an older man with the sole purpose of profiting from him.

ex_chs: 不要相信他/她，明显在欺骗你
ex_en: Don't believe him/her, they are clearly deceiving you.

ex_zhh: 俾人揾笨噶人就系水鱼
ex_chs: 给人占便宜的人就是水鱼了
ex_en: People who let others take advantage of them are suckers.

ex_zhh: 傻閪有好多种，好似你咁真滴第一次见，傻到閪噉
ex_chs: 傻子有很多种，像你一样还是第一次遇见，真的傻到一个极点
ex_en: There are many kinds of fools, but I've never met one like you before. You're truly foolish to the extreme.

ex_chs: 这么不应该的事情你都做？对你没好处
ex_en: You actually did something so wrong? It's not good for you.

ex_zhh: 戇鳩的事認真做，認真的事戇鳩做，戇鳩人生
ex_chs: 不应该的事情你花心机认真去做，应该要做的事情，你随便做，颠倒人生
ex_en: You put effort into doing things you shouldn't do, while you do the things you should do carelessly, turning your life upside down.

ex_chs: 这个自以为很帅的人怎么这么像你
ex_en: This guy who thinks he's so handsome looks so much like you.
